revised_title: Liquid Jet Impact and Penetration in Water: A Study of Cavitation Cloud and Jet-Target Interface Dynamics
tldr: This study investigates the impact and penetration of a water surface by a liquid jet. The experiments reveal the formation of an axial cavitation cloud ahead of the jet, which collapses due to an entrapped air bubble. The jet-target interface shows periodic acceleration and deceleration, and the results have implications for various practical situations involving cavities and their collapse.
